description.narrative: Health facilities in intervention areas, including urban areas and humanitarian situation, have increased capacity to provide equitable, quality and integrated immunization services.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Health facilities in intervention areas, including urban areas and humanitarian situation, have increased capacity to provide equitable, quality and integrated immunization services.

description.narrative: Major key result for children in Niger, has put this year major emphasis on effective vaccine management to improve results for the regular immunization programme as well as for the national campaigns. Significant resources were mobilized to support preventive and response campaigns, which made it possible to stop the circulation of vaccine-derived poliovirus type 2 and to significantly reduce measles cases. Maintaining "0 wild Polio Cases" status, no Health district with more than 1 case of MNT. Aiming at greater sustainability, the Programme support rationale document for Health System Strengthening 2020-2022 was developed and approved by the Gavi executive board. | Status:Constrained | As-of Date:26/12/2019

title.narrative: Number of regions with functional Coordination Committees (CCIAs)

% of districts with microplan based on ACD / equity
% of districts with measles outbreak having a vaccine response within 15 days of notification
Country had no stock-out of DTP/Penta, Polio (OPV and IPV) and Tetanus Toxoid vaccines at district level
